lines.text: What'd you say your name was?
Nah, we gotta get something different. Something unusual, something that's easy to say and hard to forget.
So you're the Blonde Venus. Don't tell me you thought of that label all by yourself.
No. Mister O'Connor told me it would help me in my work.
He would. He didn't have to think up any name for me when I put this dump on the map. My name's Taxi Belle Hooper. Taxi for short.
Do you charge for the first mile?

Say, you trying' to ride me? Don't get the wrong idea. They call me Taxi because I won't ride in nothin' else. Safety first, that's my motto. Good drinking partners always make bad drivers... Do I charge for the first mile?
Snap out of it, kid. Tomorrow's another day.
Maybe for you, but not for me.
Why? What's the matter with tomorrow?
I'm gonna' kill myself tomorrow. *That's* what's the matter with it.
Me too. Make a hole in the water.
Because that's the way I feel. Isn't that reason enough?
haven't got a dime. Never had any money, and I never WILL have.
